text:
Math and Pencil | Software Engineer | Anywhere | Full-time | https://www.mathandpencil.com

We are a small full-stack consulting agency with locations on the US East and West coast. I am looking for a talented junior dev (fresh out of college or a couple years' experience) looking to work remotely full-time building applications using:

* React/Redux * Python(Django) * Postgres/Redis * AWS/S3/Ubuntu

You need to have a degree in a technical subject, and you are going to need to pass our programming exams. Located in or near NYC a plus, but it shouldn't matter for the right candidate.

For more info: joseph dot misiti @ mathandpencil.com
